audio_descriptions.notes:
Text on screen: "Ploop TV"
youtube.com/ploopchannel

A view of the ocean, with waves, and an open sky

The sun rises above the waves

There is a small fish at the bottom of the screen, below the waves

The fish swims across the screen

More fish join, all swimming

Seaweed swaying with the movement of the ocean

Ploop swims through the sweaweed

Ploop jumps out of the water quickly

Ploop swims with his belly towards the sun

The sun goes down, and the moon rises.

Ploop swims down to the bottom of the sea and goes into a shell.

A starfish is outside his window, it smiles.

There are more starfish floating around the sea.

Ploop sleeps in his bed. 

Text on screen: "Good Night, Ploop!"

text on screen: ploop tv

0:06 blue waves of the ocean come into view with the sun rising on the horizon

0:20 a single small orange fish swims on the bottom of the sea from the left side of the screen

0:28 more fish of different sizes and colors swim into the screen from the left and right sides

0:37 the orange fish swims through swaying green seaweed

0:46 ploop swims up and out of the seaweed and does 2 loops

0:54 ploop swims up and jumps out of the ocean then swims quickly across the screen

1:02 ploop swims with his belly out of the water facing the sun

1:04-1:09 the sun goes down and the moon comes up

1:13 ploop swims into his purple shell home and looks out the window

1:20 there are many red starfish floating in the ocean

1:24 ploop is asleep in bed, text on screen: goodnight ploop

result.title: Goodnight Ploop! Clown Fish Children's Cartoons - Kid's Animation /childrens phim hoạt hình,만화 어린이
result.description:
It's time for bed! Have you met Ploop the Baby Fish? How we he get ready? Watch adventures about his fun life in cartoon animations for kids & children. What does he do day & night in the deep waters of the ocean? He plays with the other Marine and sea-life and swims amongst the seaweed and jumps out of the sea. For children, kids, babies & adults! Exciting, fun & educational English original cartoons for baby, kids & children! Animations from Ploop Channel!

More ORIGINAL Video ADVENTURES, MUSIC, EXCITING & EDUCATIONAL ENGLISH 3D CARTOONS,ANIMATIONS GAMES, MACHINES, PUZZLES & FUNNY DEMOS FOR CHILDREN, KIDS & TODDLERS at:
→ https://www.youtube.com/PloopChannel
→ https://www.facebook.com/ploop.channel
→ https://www.youtube.com/user/KidsFirstTV
→ https://vk.com/kidsfirsttv (Russian)

WHAT EDUCATIONAL VIDEOS ARE ON PLOOP CHANNEL?
Your child or toddler's favorite kid's toys & cars & cartoon characters learning to count numbers with chocolate eggs plus we have 3d videos for Children with Fire Trucks, Engines, Toy Construction Machine Vehicles & Puzzles. 
You can Learn 3d Shapes, Learn Numbers, Learn to Count, Build Trucks, see Minecraft games, there are Educational Cartoons for children about cars, toys, fruits, vegetables, flowers, Masha & the Bear, & Coloring Cartoons. There are reviews & Demos of mobile games & ipad & iphone apps for kids. 
We also have Toy review videos with Toy Collections and Construction Vehicles with Pixar cars, Lego toys, Bburago toys, Go gears toys, Brio toys,Alice toys plus Toy Trains and Railways!
You can watch Robocar Poli Rescue Vehicles & Puzzles & Games with Kinder Surprise Eggs! 
We have MUSIC! There are Nursery rhymes, Songs & Music about ABC, Alphabet Songs, ABC Dinosaur Adventures.строить и узнать головоломка приложение экскаватор.

With learning resources like LEGO, Meccano, Build & Play, Gears! WEDGiTS, Geomag, Laser Pegs & Citiblocs, children’s skills & understanding in problem-solving & motor control are developed & challenged using physics,logic & strategy with building blocks,construction structures & toy sets. Budding engineers, architects and designers can build towers, bridges & cities. Spatial, logical & maths skills are a hands-on way to encourage your child to explore shapes with plastic bricks. We use building block construction systems & geometric shapes like octahedrons. Learn to build Hot Air Balloon, Jeeps, ATV, 4wd with iPad mobile app games. Watch & learn how to construct with English educational 3d videos & cartoons about machines and construction for kids with Fire Engines, construction machines & puzzles!
